body.body: Define and discuss the basics of these tags.

After the Phase 1 tagging the taxonomy contained multiple tags related to strategy. Two of which were _device strategy_ and _strategy (optional)_. The latter was specifically tailored to games that provide the tools for the player to play strategically without explicitly expecting the player to device a strategy to succeed. These and other tags were combined under the strategy subtree, which got multiple reworks which included a rename to _strategic planning_ and mergings to a _resource management_ subtree.
A abgrezung was made from strategic planning to executing recipes like they can be found in games like [StarCraft](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/StarCraft) in form of build orders.
